abstract: The Lloyds Banking Group named Winfried F. W. Bischoff as chairman to succeed Victor Blank, who is retiring, Bloomberg News reported.
snippet: The Lloyds Banking Group named Winfried F. W. Bischoff as chairman to succeed Victor Blank, who is retiring, Bloomberg News reported.
lead_paragraph: The Lloyds Banking Group named Winfried F. W. Bischoff as its chairman on Monday to succeed Victor Blank, who is retiring, Bloomberg News reported.

headline.main: From Chairman of Citigroup to Chairman of Lloyds
